channel.title: Comments on: My Favorite WordPress Plugins – Important Ones

item.title: By: lisa@buybikini.org
item.dc:creator: lisa@buybikini.org
item.description:
Been reading your blog now for quite a long time and really love it. I don't know if it's your style or not , but do you think you could perhaps do a post on the oil spill in the gulf?
I love your thoughts and opinions, and would love to see your comments on this tragedy.
item.content:encoded:
Been reading your blog now for quite a long time and really love it. I don’t know if it’s your style or not , but do you think you could perhaps do a post on the oil spill in the gulf?

I love your thoughts and opinions, and would love to see your comments on this tragedy.

item.title: By: Roger J
item.dc:creator: Roger J
item.description: Great list of Plugins !! With so many hundreds to choose from and more being developed everyday, its getting hard and harder to know which ones are the essentials.. I have just posted a list at my "PowerTeam Marketing Network Blog" http://powerteamnetwork.com/ways-to-improve-your-blog/ that I found at http://sixrevisions.com , but truthfully I have nearly 50 plugins turned on at my site... I will put a link to this post on your Blog, so my readers can have more options... Thanks !
item.content:encoded:
Great list of Plugins !!
With so many hundreds to choose from and more being developed everyday, its getting hard and harder to know which ones are the essentials.. I have just posted a list at my “PowerTeam Marketing Network Blog” http://powerteamnetwork.com/wa.....your-blog/
that I found at http://sixrevisions.com , but truthfully I have nearly 50 plugins turned on at my site… I will put a link to this post on your Blog, so my readers can have more options…
Thanks !

item.title: By: Greg
item.dc:creator: Greg
item.description:
Blog Stats offered through Wordpress is pretty cool, it shows similar data that the google analytics shows, but you can access it via your wordpess admin panel. I also like the Users Online thing, it will show you on your blog, if you choose, how many users are online, but also in your admin panel, show you the number of users and breaks them down into bots, and actual IPs. So you will see: User1 192.168.0.0 (referred)
User 2 (BOT)yahoo
User 3 (BOT)google, etc.. Pretty nice.
item.content:encoded:
Blog Stats offered through WordPress is pretty cool, it shows similar data that the google analytics shows, but you can access it via your wordpess admin panel. I also like the Users Online thing, it will show you on your blog, if you choose, how many users are online, but also in your admin panel, show you the number of users and breaks them down into bots, and actual IPs. So you will see:
User1
192.168.0.0 (referred)

User 2
(BOT)yahoo

User 3
(BOT)google, etc.. Pretty nice.
